message:
Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'is_rec' as follows:
type is_rec = bool[@@deriving show { with_path = false }]

Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'unar_oper' as follows:
type unar_oper =
  | Negative 
  | Not [@@deriving show { with_path = false }]
